name: Return to The Path to Carcosa

achievements.title: Fair Warning
achievements.text: Defeat the Royal Emissary three times during a single playthrough of “Curtain Call.”

achievements.title: First Steps
achievements.text: Interview the following VIPs in “The Last King”:

achievements.title: Crashing the Party
achievements.text: Defeat the [[Lunatic]] version of Dianne Devine in “The Last King.”

achievements.title: For Prying Eyes
achievements.text: Add the Hidden Library to the victory display in “Echoes of the Past.”

achievements.title: The Cuckoo's Nest
achievements.text: Resign with Daniel Chesterfield under an investigator’s control in “The Unspeakable Oath.”

achievements.title: Take A Look At This!
achievements.text: Parley with the Host of Insanity in “The Unspeakable Oath.”

achievements.title: The Path of Death
achievements.text: Use your Clasp of Black Onyx to find a shortcut in “The Pallid Mask.”

achievements.title: Guessing Game
achievements.text: Advance to the final agenda of one agenda deck before advacing the first agenda of the other agenda deck in “Black Stars Rise.”

achievements.title: Hastur Made Me Do It
achievements.text: Defeat Hastur in “Dim Carcosa” while a Possession treachery is in your hand.

achievements.title: Say My Name
achievements.text: After you have heeded Daniel’s warning, speak the name of HASTUR aloud seven or more times during a single scenario (or its setup).

achievements.title: Get Back Here
achievements.text: Win The Path to Carcosa campaign having never ended a scenario with The Man in the Pallid Mask in play

achievements.title: The Path is False
achievements.text: Win The Path to Carcosa campaign with 8 Doubt.

achievements.title: The Path is Real
achievements.text: Win The Path to Carcosa campaign with 8 Conviction.

achievements.title: The Path is Mine
achievements.text: Win The Path to Carcosa campaign with less than 2 Doubt and Conviction in total.

achievements.title: Line in the Sand
achievements.text: Win The Path to Carcosa campaign with at least three Ultimatums active.

achievements.title: Carcosa Expertise=
achievements.text: Win The Path to Carcosa campaign on Expert difficulty.
